page.title: 07Retail Trade Coolham/Shipley
page.content: The Countryman Pub (Shipley) attracts 'Discerning Diners' in modernised 'traditional' surroundings, where seafood is a speciality. The Selsey Arms (Coolham) attracts passing trade. It holds Country & Western evenings and has garden barbeques. Both have new landlords, serve bar food and have loyal local support. Goods Stores is a general stores and Post Office. The shop, reduced from the size when it sold almost anything, is a long standing family business. Coolham Garage has a new forecourt, longer opening hours and improved facilities under the new local owner- ship of J.K.Leech. It has a car repair workshop and is noted for unique window displays and sales of Leech Fuels. Friendly service is a feature of all local businesses!
